characters.description: The Unidentified Aspho Point guard was a former Indie soldier that was wounded during the Pendulum Wars and took a job at Aspho Point . During Operation Leveler , he was lucky enough to escape Natan 's fate at the hands of Pesanga commando Shim Kor . He made it to the roof to warn local Ostrini forces. He was killed by Dom and Hoffman after Helena Stroud was able to see his flashlight from the top floor. [ 3 ]

characters.name: Gary Carmine
characters.description: Gary Carmine was born sometime after 17 A.E. into the Carmine Family. He was considered the "black sheep" of the family for being fiercely independent and critical of the Coalition of Ordered Governments. Despite his criticisms of the COG, he idolized his family member, Clayton Carmine, as a hero.
